message.content:
1. The trial was prospective.
2. The trial was double-blinded.
3. The trial was randomized.
4. The trial compared the effects of a high protein diet to a normal protein diet.
5. The high protein diet consisted of 5 g · kg−1 · d−1.
6. The normal protein diet consisted of 2 g · kg−1 · d−1.
7. The diets were administered enterally.
8. The trial subjects were children under 24 months old.
9. The trial focused on protein kinetics.
10. The children in the trial had undergone surgical repair of congenital heart disease.
11. The effects of the diets were measured on day 2 following the surgery.

messages.content:
Statement: In a prospective, double-blinded, randomized trial we compared the effects of a HP (5 g · kg−1 · d−1) versus normal protein (NP, 2 g · kg−1 · d−1) enteral diet on protein kinetics in children <24 months, on day 2 following surgical repair of congenital heart disease.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
